content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0)
Consists of steam engine (position 0), boiler (position 1), and offshore pump (position 2).

### Copper plate mine at position(3)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 3) and a furnace at position (4).
- Burner mining drill (position 5) and a furnace at position (6).
- Burner mining drill (position 7) and a furnace at position (8).

### Copper cable factory at position(9)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (10) and inserter at position (11) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position 12) that connects the furnace at position 4 to the assembling machine at position (10).

### Furnace at position(13)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 13) that is used for smelting iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors when inspecting entities
- When inspecting an entity, ensure that it is not empty or has no items to avoid confusion regarding its inventory status.
